p: When acute inflammatory response was controlled, the result is the elimination of the infectious agents followed by a resolution and repair phase [ 3]. However, when the inflammation is uncontrolled it can be harmful to health [ 4, 5, 6]. Main events during the inflammatory state involve nitric oxide (NO) imbalance, lipid peroxidation, cytokines release, and maybe the most important, neutrophil-derived reactive oxygen species (ROS) formation [ 7].
